general.name: Astro Church
general.description: We exist to be and make eternally joyful disciples of Jesus Christ. Sojourners is a baptistic, reformed, non-denominational church in Albert Lea, Minnesota. Join us Sundays at 10am in the Skyline Plaza!

hero.text: Free, open-source template for building great church websites with Astro

cta.text: 10 am Sundays | Click here for livestream
